website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H90 is a fine choice for those wanting a compact 16x zoom lens for casual use.
pros: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H90 offers a 16x zoom, a high-res 3-inch LCD, and an above-average list of shooting options
cons: Like Sony's other CCD sensor-based Cyber-shots, the H90 is slow and has a noticeable drop-off in photo quality above ISO 200

customer_reviews.title: NO CHARGER
customer_reviews.text: I really like the camera itself, but I was mislead into thinking it came with a way to charge the battery and it did not. Because of this I have not been able to use it. The price was good and I thought I was getting a really good deal, turns out not so much. Because now in order for me to be able to use it and charge it, I have to order a charger that is going to cost just as much as the camera itself. The listing for this camera needs to be more transparent than what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Y.Sams

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: It works great and meets our expectations based on what we read about it before purchasing. The zoom and panoramic features seem to be working well and are the reason we bought this one over other cameras for a similar price. The flash also works well but the button is sometimes held down by mistake because of the location of where it pops up. I'm sure our daughter, who we bought the camera for, will get used to that and it won't be a problem. She is still learning all of the features and settings but it seems to be working well and the quality of the pictures has been good.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best Camera Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Camera Ever ! For a Pocket cam. I don't use the photo part of this too often, but when I do the color quality is supurb! I mainly use this as my hiking/watersport, Movie cam. Takes excellent movies, and the sound works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera packs the same punch as my larger SLR. I was looking for a compact digital with a lot of zoom and this one suits my needs perfectly. The sweep panorama is flawless. The intelligent auto mode is fantastic for getting a high quality, quick point and shoot shot. The manual settings allow for setting up shots with just as much control and precision as my SLR without having to lug around the cumbersome bag and equipment. Buy this camera, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: A sophisticated point-and-shoot
customer_reviews.text: My wife refuses to carry a full-size DSLR. We bought this camera prior to a trip to Britain, and she used it exclusively. Her photos are amazingly sharp and well-exposed. The zoom on the camera is very long (416mm in 35mm photography terms). At this extreme zoom range, photos lose contrast rapidly, but some of the "snap" can be restored through post-processing. All-in-all, an impressive piece of technology.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis G.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: The depth of focus and shutter speed make this a good camera for pictures of wild-life. The panorama function is less of a plus than I'd hoped, it's hard to find panoramas that are at a suitable distance since you can't zoom while using this function and the image generally gets distorted, proportions are warped because there's always one point of the view that the photographer is standing closest to with respect to the entire image.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the zoom but slow to process the photos
customer_reviews.text: have had a lot of digital cameras and I LOVE the zoom on this. The other features are fine too, but the zoom is what I really want and am very happy with. The only negative is that the photos take longer for the camera to save. When I want to take several photos in quick succession (not together like the 3-shots-in-a-row), but different images of different items, but close together, it is really noticeable. . A pain.
customer_reviews.author: rambelmont

customer_reviews.title: it is a great product. Initially each photo used to be of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Amazon, it is a great product. Initially each photo used to be of 6 MB, was diffcult to email. I learnt how to reduce the setting to take pics of around 1 mb size. This setting is perfect for me. Has enough clarity without taking and using a lot of MBs. The size is also perfect. It takes great pictures for its compact size. Zoom shots have the image stabilizer, so the pics come out pretty clear. Great camera worth the money you spend. More than adequate for a non professional photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: OK but having problems after just 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Photo turn out well. Operating zoom ... It is pretty slow, so if you quickly want to zoom in and capture that special moment...you will be disappointed. After 6 months of using it, it is acting up, e.g. it will not turn on. That is not consistent though...so I have not brought it in for repair yet. It also is slow in taking pics itsrlf--by the time it is ready, it's often too late. But once you do get a shot, the pic quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great zoom
customer_reviews.text: I looked for awhile for a camera that provided me with a great zoom. This camera didn't zoom as much as my old one, but because of the high MP, it actually takes better pictures and when I crop pictures it's a much clearer picture. I love it and the color !
customer_reviews.author: clubmichael

customer_reviews.title: Good camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera captures great pics, even in snow, bright light, etc. You really have to figure what settings you want for "blink detection" or "smile detection", etc...and the only drawback I've found was the flash pops up usually where your finger is on top so you end up holding it down by mistake...so you have to hold it on the sides. Other than that we truly love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Scifi28

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great little camera. I can take pictures of the geese without getting so close I scare them way. I can also get close to flowers. It seems that everything that others have complained about could be fixed buy reading the manual of the instructions on line. Even so, It is very easy to use and user friendly. I am an old woman and not a big techy
customer_reviews.author: charily

customer_reviews.title: Good "point and shoot" to live in a handbag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an Olympus which is now devouring batteries. This was very easy to pick up and use and is taking good shots. Its low-light performance is currently not superb, but that could be me relying too heavily on auto mode. There are a *lot* of options on this camera, which means I probably just haven't found the right one for those shots. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: BayouBrit

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at this camera when it first was priced at around 250 dollars, but when it dropped down to bellow 150 I had to have it. It is quite a steal for that price. the camera takes good photos for the price. I have a DSLR and I have to admit that the DSLR takes noticeably better photos, but it also costed over 4 times as much. That said, I love this camera and know that it is a steal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Mathews

customer_reviews.title: My fiance loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking pictures of birds, as the zoom is just good enough to get them while their standing still in the trees. Images are not anywhere near Pro level quality, but still great for an amateur just wanted keepsakes of their vacations. Will still keep an SLR with some good optic's nearby for when I really care about the shot.
customer_reviews.author: K and D

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, point and click is a snap, and the zoom works amazingly well. I am even able to shoot pictures for my jewelry web site using this camera and the photos come out better than the ones I used an SLR for! Highly recommended for crafters who need to photo stuff for Etsy shops and such.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: I love the zoom and the portabilty of the product
customer_reviews.text: So far I have taken many pictures since my purchase. I love the zoom and the portabilty of the product. I purchased a thicker camera case to protect the camera from the elements since I am a hiker and take mostly outdoor photos.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah moyer

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this camera !! Takes a great picture in low light and easy to use. I have a very expensive Nikon and this takes close to the same quality...This is my third one. Lost the last one so got it in red...this time.
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: mini digital
customer_reviews.text: So far the pics have not been that clear and perhaps I need to upgrade to a full feature/full size camera. The pics are about the same quality as you'd get with your cell phone. i guess I expected too much of a mini sized camera
customer_reviews.author: CabelasKen

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact camera
customer_reviews.text: I gave this this camera to my daughter and after two years she had given me back. It works perfect and best pics. I found this a wonderful camera. I know I will be using it for years since this has everything needed at this digital age!
customer_reviews.author: Nara

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-Shot DSCH90... black bundle
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your prompt attention to my order. The camera arrived as promised. It is simple enough for my family to use. The 16x zoom is wonderful for our zoo visits. We were so happy that you have a memory card included in the bundle so picture taking doesn't have to wait!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lgvs13

customer_reviews.title: Sony camera great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This camera has a very wide angle lens that is super for taking pictures of landscapes or buildings when traveling. Plus it has a 16x Optical Zoom which allows for nice close-ups. Sometimes reviewing the pictures taken is a little slow, but it hasn't really been a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Seaford

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for a birthday present for my sister. She was very surprised and loved it right away. She's learning all the bells & whistles, so when we get some pictures printed I'm sure they will be great. Of course, I need to get an extra battery since these hold a pretty good charge, but like an extra in reserve. All in all, I would highly recommend purchasing this camera for anyone looking for a reasonable digital camera.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy L. Batton

customer_reviews.title: Sony
customer_reviews.text: I misplaced my camera and was headed for an overseas trip. I overnighted this from Amzaon and got good pictures with it. It was a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne B. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality but a little slow on the zooming when shooting videos.
customer_reviews.author: Osman U.

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: It's really my husband using this, but he's had very little issue with learning all the features. We are not professional at all, and really like that it's nearly "point and shoot." Very nice camera for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Used it for my family's disney trip and loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my family's disney trip and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Big Walt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sony Cyber Camera.
customer_reviews.text: Now this is one awesome camera. It takes clear pictures and has some great fitures love that you can also take videos. I needed this camera last year when we went to the Grand Canyon. Oh Well I have it now for this year vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Help
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my trip to the Amazon. I used my discover points and there was an issue with the way amazon used my points. However, Amazon and the company that shipped me the camera helped correct the problem immediately. The camera takes great photos and videos. Especially for the price of this product. I have not used all of the features, but so far, I am impressed with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo A. Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Great Features
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace the one I had for two years and lost. It works well and I take great shots with it. Obviously I am smitten. It was cheaper this time though.
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: excellent camera for families to enjoy, everything went very well and the seller was very responsible and reliable. The diarioa use and works great
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Ciarliero

customer_reviews.title: Very good products and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: The whole product is very good as the seller promised to be
customer_reviews.author: Marwan AL Rabee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: It is a very versatile camera, easy to use, and with a performance almost a professional. I'm very happy with its utility. I recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: German Dario Ramon

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: for a point n shoot camera it takes pix as nice as professional. the high mega pixal & high zoom go great when crpping pix
customer_reviews.author: Denny Newborn

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera - easy to use and plenty of options for taking pictures. The only thing I don't like about it is where the flash is located - top left corner right where you put your finger while holding the camera. It startled me the first time it started coming up so I jostled the camera and messed up the picture. I usually keep the flash off now because of the that. Otherwise, it's a good camera that takes good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: cac

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great camera for my wife. It is easy to use and takes great pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Auto focus needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Sony based on my previous experience with these cameras. However, I find it's auto focus function takes too long for adjusting, particularly when you are trying to capture the moving object. The auto focus is also not that great when it comes to macro photography. Not what I expected with Sony camera.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: ORGANIZED AND FULFILLED
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT. THE PRODUCT OFFERED SAME AS REQUESTED. RECOMMENDED TO 100% TO MAKE YOUR SHOPPING. DEFINITELY OTHER PRODUCTS OFFERED AGAIN BUY FOR YOU. THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: HENRY GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Freezes action extremely well. Very clear image even after zooming in on image on the viewfinder after taking picture. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: jojo

customer_reviews.title: Travel
customer_reviews.text: Great travel camera instead of carrying a DLSR. Multiple features make this very useful even for the Intermediate/Pro photographer. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Xander

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: for a point and shoot camera at this price you cant beat it. I have always enjoyed any Cybershot product
customer_reviews.author: CowBoy

customer_reviews.title: Sony is Sony
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Sony camera. As previous ones this one is good to. For this price I think you can’t buy anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Large viewing screen , easy to operate, beautiful pictures, adjust to macro on it's own. Great value with the case and memory card.
customer_reviews.author: peachpotter47

customer_reviews.title: Sony camera
customer_reviews.text: Not pleased with the pictures. I had better luck with the older model. Seems to be out of focus. Blaaaaa
customer_reviews.author: Irma Payan

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Easy to use and takes great photo. Zoom really brings in things from a distance. Movie feature works great too.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne C.

customer_reviews.title: Was exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this camera specifically for taking landscape shots and it worked exceedingly well for that application. There is a long delay between pressing the "shoot" button and seeing the picture but my subjects were not moving so it made no difference to me. I did miss not having a view finder though.
customer_reviews.author: 8arrowheads

customer_reviews.title: great small camera with lots of features
customer_reviews.text: it is compact and yet a 16x optical zoom, anti-vibration feature and panorama shot, great value for the price .
customer_reviews.author: manolo

customer_reviews.title: Sony cyber shot H90 review
customer_reviews.text: Great camera at a great value . Highly recommend. We used it on our cruise vacation. Great digital pictures. Also good panoramic pictures. Would recommend buying a as card with it. I did and had plenty of space. Battery last couple of days. Great price and good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: timtigo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Camara, I never tire of seeing and appreciating
customer_reviews.text: definitely one of the cameras that I liked most is this. its design is very attractive city, this new, no used, spanking new. Thanks to this provider describing your article as it is. I recommend FredysG Maracaibo, Venezuela
customer_reviews.author: Fredys G-Venezuela

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoors in daylight. Shadows block up indoors. Can't use flash in museums so I can't fill in the darks.
customer_reviews.author: John Gregory

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Using it is very easy, and the resolution and pics are very clear. I know people are saying that the flash could be relocated. Maybe yea, but it isn't much of a problem. I think it is fine. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: syeda zahra

customer_reviews.title: Very dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes fuzzy pictures. Ive tried to return and get no response! Very dissappointed and wouldnt recommend.. Not at all what was described.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: I am a realtor that needs wide angle and panoramic pictures. The detail and ease of this camers is great. Battery life is long which makes life easier. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Painter

customer_reviews.title: Great camera except....
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. It takes excellent pictures and the 16x zoom is great. One caveat--the flash is right where you put your left hand and interferes with the flash popping up. I think the flash could be better located.
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Kreidler

customer_reviews.title: 30x zoom comes in handy
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, no problems yet.only thing is flash pops up on top left where I am used to holding camera. just some getting used to on my part.
customer_reviews.author: 4theboys

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: This little camera takes wonderful pictures and the zoom is perfect for its size. It isn't as fast in frames per second as my digital SLR, but if you are looking for a compact little camera to capture friends and scenery, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Cyber-shot
customer_reviews.text: My wife had wanted a camera which had a longer telephoto capability than the one she had so when we returned from a trip I started to look for something that would give her the capabilities she wanted. After checking several different models from numerous manufacturers I decided on the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H90. We have gone on a cruise since she got her new camera and she took over a thousand pictures, the camera performed flawlesly and she is very pleased with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Gunter E. L. von der Heyde

customer_reviews.title: I liked the camera except for USB instead of HDMI and pop-up flash where you hold the camera
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera, I had a similar camera with a different model number with HDMI, this one is USB, somewhat troubled me Other than that, the camera is great. I didn't like the old style pop-up flash where you hold the camera, somewhat inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Ven

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: It is better. Easy to use.I love it. İt is chepar than I expected. I have been used for a month No problem up to now.
customer_reviews.author: Muciz Ozcan

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Technology in cameras affordable and ergonomically designed. A quality brand like Sony. THE results are very good. I recommend this product widely.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Gonzalez M

customer_reviews.title: Camera can not read HCSD cards.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, its better late than never but i was very dissapointed with this buy. It appears that camera can not read or process HCSD cards (High Capacity), which means that cameras reading and writing speed is very low and i can not really record videos in highest deffinition. However, camera works with ancient sd cards by sony as well as Micro Duo which are not being produced since 2008 and carry highest capacity of 4gigs, which roughly can accomodate 30-40 high resolution pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Schmoo

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera, Great pictures, Poor flash placement
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the pictures. As with many other buyers, I agree that the flash was misplaced. One would think that a company like Sony would consider ergonomics when designing a small camera.
customer_reviews.author: verygood9640

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. It has a very intuitive settings system and works really fast. The images are amazing. Brightness and colors are definitely better than most of the regular compacts. I recommend it 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Rossana

customer_reviews.title: Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely timely shipping and just as advertised! Thanks! This was a present for my daughter for Christmas...she loved it and has taken some really great pictures with it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Really good stuff
customer_reviews.text: User friendly. Picture quality is awesome Best stuff in this price range It's a good idea to go with the complete pack-Camera, Cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sunil

customer_reviews.title: It is really nice
customer_reviews.text: I am having a ball with my new camera. It is compact and easy to use. I really enjoy using the camera
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reid

customer_reviews.title: excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera very good resolution, very good zoom, the photos are very clear and perfect functions. I got great pictures with my family.
customer_reviews.author: Mauro

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Camera takes great pictures, and is very user friendly. The flash pops up automatically when required, so you don't forget. My only con is that the flash is located right where you hold the camera, so you must remeber to grasp it in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: jd46ski

customer_reviews.title: Marlys
customer_reviews.text: Excellent seller, I recommend it 100%, everything was done at the right time, the camera worked great, I'm pleased charm. I arrive in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Marlys Briceño

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying it
customer_reviews.text: Really good camera. Has good clarity among the ranges. Really refer to buy this one if you are looking for camera in this range.
customer_reviews.author: Shashidhar SD

customer_reviews.title: Very good version of a digital camera
customer_reviews.text: I was following this camera in a while, I like a lot, fortunately low price. Product arrived in excellent condition. 100% recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Bedoya

customer_reviews.title: This camera is great!
customer_reviews.text: When I lost my other Sony Cyber-shot and needed a camera immediately, I couldn't find this camera so bought another. After taking pics, I returned the other camera and finally found the one I wanted on line. The pictures are clear and I'll stay with this until I find something that works better- and I haven't yet!
customer_reviews.author: Gay Thrower

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product,and it can take the perfect photoes.but just a little pity for me because these's no chinese languaga,so many functions i can't use
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Blurry shots
customer_reviews.text: I'm not impressed with this camera.....I have a very hard time getting clear shots that aren't blurry. Not impressed at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R Tulley

customer_reviews.title: Camera with a style
customer_reviews.text: nice product. And must look for memory card. Without it, its trouble. better have a memory card. (4 gb) is good enough. But i like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohan KUNTIPURAM

customer_reviews.title: no much words  ....
customer_reviews.text: a really good camera ...good zoon good M.P. i recomend this Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H90 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom it works exelent for me..
customer_reviews.author: willian

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H90
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H90 is Spot On. It is economical, fast action, great zoom, extremely easy to use and portable.
customer_reviews.author: R1

customer_reviews.title: great graet great camera.
customer_reviews.text: a great deal. 16 MP with 16 x zoom in this price is a great deal. 3 inch LCD screen is also very good display. easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: nikhil

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great compact camera that creates a great picture! This camera fits great in your pocket and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great quick camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife. She wanted a smaller, easier to carry camera. Her DSLR was a bit big and cumbersome for quick candids and such. This camera has done the trick. The seller was quick and the product has met all our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Dohtig

customer_reviews.title: Worked one time and then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy when I received the camera only two day after I ordered it. So that part was great. We used the camera one day at the Zoo and it was really easy to use and the quality of picture was great. The next time I tried to use it it wouldn't turn on. Tried to recharge the batteries thinking that was the problem. No luck. I had to send it back to Sony which cost me $22 to send. I still have not received it back Yet. So I didn't get to use it for Christmas or New Years. Not very happy
customer_reviews.author: M Winters

customer_reviews.title: the focus is not good at all
customer_reviews.text: The outside is made of very cheap plastic. The auto focus is quite poor so the images I took are not sharp at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Rose

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice camera
customer_reviews.text: It is OK and it was shipped on time, no problem installing it and it is working fine, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Rojas

customer_reviews.title: camera works fine but you are on your own about learning how to use it , manual is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Just takes a lot of practice to get good with this camera, a lot of unneccesary bells and whistles but takes good photos. The manual is absolutely awful.
customer_reviews.author: David Lancto

customer_reviews.title: Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Over a hectic Christmas with toddler twins in an overful house, I lost my camera. Tossed out with trash? I bought this, exactly the one I had lost, because I do think it's a very good camera.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B. Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Good camera!
customer_reviews.text: It records good video. Takes good pictures. It has manual settings also. Nice interface. Metal material in front. Multy shot! only one minus, when the camera connected to computer with USB, very fast gets battery empty. I don't know why.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Still testing but have a couple of problems
customer_reviews.text: Don't like a few items compared to our DSC-H55 : battery release lever is difficult to use and review and magnifications seem to take much longer. Most obvious are zoom problems including difficulty focusing at distance and a shadow caused by the lens extension on close up flash shots. Still testing all the other functions.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife...she needs the technology to stop the blur when she takes pictures. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Merrow

customer_reviews.title: Nice cammera
customer_reviews.text: All is good, good focus, good manual l . . . . . .. . . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Andres Vidal

customer_reviews.title: This camera has not good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera is not that much good, I did not found that much good what I expected. Its picture quality is very bad. Even though it has good thing 16Mp and 16x optical zoom but picture quality is not good. Pictures are like you washed with water.The deal was excellent but quality is worse. I don't recommend anybody to spend money on such type of camera. If you will spent your money on this camera, think that you just wasting. If somebody give you this camera @ $40 then it may be good but for$41 is not a good deal
customer_reviews.author: HARIP

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my parents. Delievered on time and came with all items as described. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Drabick

customer_reviews.title: I'm not happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.text: compaired to the Canon cameras I've used in the past, this thing makes a good brick. I got it in December, 2012 and as of February, 11th. it's been at Sony repair . The time to send it back to ran out on Jan, 31st. 2013. The few pictures I took with it were of poor quality . I could go on but I'll leave at that.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Hendrix

customer_reviews.text: very good i vove it it is what i want so nice i like it thans so much it is great

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cyber shot DSC h90 16.1mp
customer_reviews.text: The zoom on it does a good job for a little camera but you get a lot of blurry pictures when anyone is moving. It does not have the anti blur sports setting that my previous cyber shot had. Over all disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: gmmg

customer_reviews.title: SONY
customer_reviews.text: GOT THIS FOR MY SIS FOR A XMAS GIFT AND SHE LOVES IT. YES SHE DOES, YES SHE DOES. YES
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: A Sony Of My Ownie
customer_reviews.text: I love Sony products and this little cyber-shot is perfect. It has all the clarity and power as my larger Sony camera, yet this one fits in my purse. So now I have a great camera with me all the time and the picture is perfect every time. I love having a quality camera available for all those once in a lifetime wildlife photo ops.
customer_reviews.author: JacLynWin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for the zoom and the name. when I took it out of the box it was heavier than I thought. I guess should have expected that with a 16x zoom.Its a big camera. Does not have a shortcut button for video The flash is in a terrible spot in front of the camera. I ended up returning it for a Nikon Coolpix. I'm happy with that.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Guercio

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: i used in bigs ands smalls word in the company, also for travels, good resolution, lite and comfortable easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Felipe

product_meta.title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H90 16.1 MP Digital Camera with 16x Optical Zoom and 3.0-inch LCD (Red) (2012 Model)
product_meta.description:
Color:Red| Style:Camera OnlyYour subjects are never too far to capture with this Sony Cyber-shot(R) DSC-H90 digital camera with stabilized 16x optical zoom. Sporting a 16.1-megapixel sensor, you can shoot crisp photos at up to 10 frames per second (fps) so you'll never miss the shot-plus record HD 720p video of all your memorable moments (records in 29-minute segments). Review your shots and menu options on the big and bright 3.0" LCD, let your creativity run free with amusing Picture Effects or try Sweep Panorama 360 mode for impressive 360 panoramic pictures. With this compact, easy-to-use Sony camera on hand, rest assured your best memories will be preserved in brilliant quality and clarity. Optical SteadyShot(R) image stabilization - Uses a built-in gyro sensor to detect camera shake and automatically shifts the lens to help prevent blur without sacrificing image quality Sweep Panorama mode (up to 360 ) - Reach beyond the traditional wide angle lens, and capture more breathtaking shots with Sweep Panorama modeSpecifications Sensor Size / Total Pixels / Filter - 1/2.3-inch Super HAD(TM) CCD / 16.4 Total Megapixels CCD / RGB Primary Color Filter Effective Pixels - 16.1 Megapixels Lens - Sony G Optical Zoom - 16x Focal Length (35mm equivalent) - Still 16 - 9 - 26-416mm. / Still 4 - 3 - 24-384mm / Movie 16 - 9 - 25-400mm(SteadyShot Standard), 26-416mm(SteadyShot Active) / Movie 4 - 3 - 31-496mm(SteadyShot Standard), 32-672mm(SteadyShot Active) Steady Shot Mode Active - Yes LCD - 3.0 Clear Photo LCD (460K dots) Storage Media - Optional MS DUO/PRO DUO/PRO HG DUO & SD/SDHC/SDXC media Still Image Size (JPEG) - Up to 16 - 9 12M(4,608 2,592) / 4 - 3 16M(4,608x3,456) Video Mode - Up to 1280x720(Fine)(1,280x720/30fps)/1280x720(Standard)(1,280x720/30fps)/VGA(640x480/30fps) ISO - Auto, 100 - 3200 Flash - Built-in Microphone/Speaker - Mono/mono Interface - Multi (AV/USB) High-speed USB 2.0, Composite

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

SONY CYBER-SHOT DSC-H90 16.1 MP DIGITAL CAMERA WITH 16X OPTICAL ZOOM AND 3.0-INCH LCD 

 * 16x optical zoom
   
 * Capture your videos in 720p HD Movie mode
 * Take stunning images in Sweep Panorama mode-up to 360°
 * 16.1 MP plus a 3.0-inch Clear Photo LCD
   
 * Optical SteadyShot image stabilization reduces blur
   
 * Picture Effect for more expressive photos
 * iAuto mode automatically optimizes camera settings
 * Face Detection and Smile Shutter technologies
   
 * Anti-Blink, Face Priority and Red Eye Reduction functions
 * Soft Skin mode reduces visible blemishes and wrinkles




































Get up close with your shots with the Sony DSC-H90's stabilized 16X optical zoom. Its 16.1MP sensor records crisp photos plus HD 720p video. View images and menus on the bright 3.0-inch LCD, and enjoy features that enhance creativity with built-in Picture Effect, and Sweep Panorama modes.



KEY FEATURES
16X OPTICAL ZOOM
The Sony 16x optical zoom G lens brings distant subjects super close for great outdoors, sports, and travel photos. The compact size makes it easy to take with you in a pocket, purse, or backpack.


720P MP4 HD MOVIE MODE

In 720p MP4 movie mode, the DSC-H90 shoots 1280 x 720 high definition movies at 30 fps, a standard format when working with a PC. Users will create high quality movies with full use of optical zoom in files small enough to transfer to compatible PC or Mac computer.1 Once transferred to your computer and connected to the internet, you can effortlessly upload your media to popular photo and video-sharing websites such as Photobucket and YouTube.

SWEEP PANORAMA MODE-UP TO 360°
Reach beyond the traditional wide angle lens, and capture more breathtaking shots with Sweep Panorama mode. Simply press the shutter button and sweep the camera in the desired direction and the camera continuously shoots at a high speed, then seamlessly stitches the images together with automatic position adjustment to create one stunning panoramic image. Available in wide and up to 360° full circle, the DSC-H90 can take a variety of panoramic shots. Now capturing wide landscapes is as easy as press and sweep.


16.1 MEGAPIXEL IMAGE SENSOR

A powerful 16.1 megapixel Super HAD CCD image sensor helps you capture gorgeous images with superb contrast and clarity down to the finest detail. With 16.1 megapixels, you can create stunning, photo-quality prints up to A3+ (13x19 inch) size, or crop your images and still come away with high resolution shots.


OPTICAL STEADYSHOT IMAGE STABILIZATION

Optical SteadyShot image stabilization uses a built-in gyro sensor to detect camera shake and automatically shifts the lens to help prevent blur without sacrificing image quality.


INTELLIGENT AUTO MODE
Unlike traditional auto mode, Intelligent Auto (iAuto) mode thinks for you, recognizing scenes, lighting conditions, faces, and adjusts settings resulting in clear images, faces with natural skin tone and less blur. Take advantage of all the technology without leaving Auto mode. Kids on the playground, landscape shots, a beautiful flower or an indoor birthday party; all result in clear images without leaving auto mode.

PICTURE EFFECT FOR MORE EXPRESSIVE PHOTOS 

Picture Effect adds a new level of expression to photos, making ordinary landscapes and portraits come to life by heightening mood and emphasizing certain attributes. Select camera models have up to nine different effects. 

PHOTO CREATIVITY
Photo Creativity allows you to fine-tune your exposure settings, such as brightness, color, and vividness, and quickly choose the right enhancement for your subject. Now you can view Picture Effects and Photo Creativity effects in real time on the camera’s monitor or in the viewfinder before shooting.

FACE DETECTION TECHNOLOGY 

Face Detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and adjusts focus, exposure, and white balance to help deliver crisp, properly lit images of family and friends.


SMILE SHUTTER TECHNOLOGY 


Smile Shutter technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority andindicate the degree of Smile Detection sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can now be used together with Smile Shutter mode when the Intelligent Auto mode is on. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting. 



ANTI-BLINK FUNCTION 

It’s frustrating to capture the perfect shot, only to review it later and discover subjects blinked during the photo. The Anti-blink function works to help counter blinking and squinting. When the camera is set to Soft Snap, the Anti-blink function captures two images, recording only the photo with less squinting. If a blink is detected in other shooting modes, a warning will be displayed after you take the shot.

SOFT SKIN MODE

Portrait subjects will love the results. Soft Skin mode recognizes skin tones and reduces the appearance of blemishes and wrinkles without affecting the rest of the shot.

INTELLIGENT SCENE RECOGNITION (ISCN) MODE

Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) Mode automatically detects 33 different types of scenes and selects the appropriate camera settings. In Auto Mode, the camera takes a single shot using the optimal settings. In Advanced Mode, the camera takes a photo with the optimal settings and, if in difficult lighting (low light or back light) immediately takes a second photo with another optimized setting so you can choose which to keep.

NATURAL FLASH

Conventional point-and-shoot camera flash shots just don't capture colors the way the eye sees them. Natural Flash mode takes a reference shot without flash and then uses that reference to correct the color, for far more lifelike images.

MOTION DETECTION

Motion Detection, along with Face Motion Detection adjusts ISO sensitivity and increases the shutter speed when movement is detected, reducing blur in moving subjects and faces.


 * 
 * 

1. Records in 29 minute segments
feature_bullets: 16.1 megapixels "Exmor R" CMOS sensor for superior low-light performance
